messages.message:
hello team, in build, when i have a lengthy document like a contract, and i want to create a new field.
When i use the “Selection Mode” to mark the field in the document to generate the Prompt for me, every time i click the “Selection Mode” Button, the document scrolls to the top.

fyi this is an internal-only feature that we never moved to GA

btw do you have split classification turned on in your Build project? this doesn't occur for me in my project on aihub.instabase.com (http://aihub.instabase.com), so i'm wondering what's different about your Build project
no i havnt turned on this

ok i can reproduce in my other Build project on aihub.instabase.com (http://aihub.instabase.com)

however, you can scroll down after turning on the selection mode
i think this is a known bug, but we haven't prioritized this since this isn't an externally available feature
